languages.text: "Я все еще не верю, что вы, Лорд-капитан, позволили мне остаться... не избавились от меня... я докажу... оправдаю ваше доверие".
"I still can't believe that you let me stay, Lord Captain... You didn't get rid of me... I'll prove— I'll live up to the trust you've placed in me."
languages.original_text: "Я все еще не верю, что вы, Лорд-капитан, позволили мне остаться... не избавились от меня... я докажу... оправдаю ваше доверие".

traits.locale_text: "I still can't believe that you let me stay, Lord Captain... You didn't get rid of me... I'll prove— I'll live up to the trust you've placed in me."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I still can't believe that you let me stay, Lord Captain... You didn't get rid of me... I'll prove— I'll live up to the trust you've placed in me."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I still can't believe that you let me stay, Lord Captain... You didn't get rid of me... I'll prove— I'll live up to the trust you've placed in me."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I still can't believe that you let me stay, Lord Captain... You didn't get rid of me... I'll prove— I'll live up to the trust you've placed in me."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “我还是不敢相信，你居然允许我留在船上，舰长大人……你没有抛弃我……我会证明，不，我绝不会负你对我的信任。”
languages.original_text: "I still can't believe that you let me stay, Lord Captain... You didn't get rid of me... I'll prove— I'll live up to the trust you've placed in me."

traits.locale_text: “我还是不敢相信，你居然允许我留在船上，舰长大人……你没有抛弃我……我会证明，不，我绝不会负你对我的信任。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « J'arrive toujours pas à croire que vous m'autorisez à rester, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Vous vous êtes pas {mf|débarrassé|débarrassée} de moi... Je prouverai... Je me montrerai digne de votre confiance. »
languages.original_text: "I still can't believe that you let me stay, Lord Captain... You didn't get rid of me... I'll prove— I'll live up to the trust you've placed in me."

traits.locale_text: « J'arrive toujours pas à croire que vous m'autorisez à rester, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Vous vous êtes pas {mf|débarrassé|débarrassée} de moi... Je prouverai... Je me montrerai digne de votre confiance. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Sigo sin creer que me haya dejado quedarme, Lord Capitán... No se ha deshecho de mí... Le demostraré... que soy digna de la confianza depositada en mí».
languages.original_text: "I still can't believe that you let me stay, Lord Captain... You didn't get rid of me... I'll prove— I'll live up to the trust you've placed in me."

traits.locale_text: «Sigo sin creer que me haya dejado quedarme, Lord Capitán... No se ha deshecho de mí... Le demostraré... que soy digna de la confianza depositada en mí».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「私に留まれだなんてまだ信じられないわ、ロード・キャプテン…あなた様は私を見捨てなかった…証明するわ、その信頼に応えたいの」
languages.original_text: "I still can't believe that you let me stay, Lord Captain... You didn't get rid of me... I'll prove— I'll live up to the trust you've placed in me."

traits.locale_text: 「私に留まれだなんてまだ信じられないわ、ロード・キャプテン…あなたは私を見捨てなかった…証明するわ、その信頼に応えたいの」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ich kann noch immer nicht glauben, dass Ihr mich bleiben lasst, Lord Captain ... Ihr habt mich nicht beseitigt ... Ich werde Euch beweisen ... Ich werde Euer Vertrauen rechtfertigen."
languages.original_text: "I still can't believe that you let me stay, Lord Captain... You didn't get rid of me... I'll prove— I'll live up to the trust you've placed in me."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann noch immer nicht glauben, dass Ihr mich bleiben lasst, Lord Captain ... Ihr habt mich nicht beseitigt ... Ich werde Euch beweisen ... Ich werde Euer Vertrauen rechtfertigen."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "I still can't believe that you let me stay, Lord Captain... You didn't get rid of me... I'll prove— I'll live up to the trust you've placed in me."

languages.text: "Burada kalmama izin verdiğini hâlâ daha inanamıyorum Lord Kaptan... Benden kurtulmaya çalışmadın. Ben... Bana duyduğun güveni boşa çıkarmayacağım, göreceksin."
languages.original_text: "I still can't believe that you let me stay, Lord Captain... You didn't get rid of me... I'll prove— I'll live up to the trust you've placed in me."

traits.locale_text: "Burada kalmama izin verdiğini hâlâ daha inanamıyorum Lord Kaptan... Benden kurtulmaya çalışmadın. Ben... Bana duyduğun güveni boşa çıkarmayacağım, göreceksin."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
